text: Dark Cloud 2, name title different in Japan and PAL regions as , is a role- playing video game made by Level-5 and released by Sony Computer Entertainment for the PlayStation 2 game console. It is the Spiritual successor for the PlayStation 2. It is sequel to the original Dark Cloud. title: Dark Cloud 2
